abstract: Private funeral service for former New York Gov Mario Cuomo will be held at Church of St Ignatius Loyola in Manhattan.
lead_paragraph: The private service for Mr. Cuomo, who died Thursday, will be held at the Church of St. Ignatius Loyola on the Upper East Side of Manhattan.
snippet: The private service for Mr. Cuomo, who died Thursday, will be held at the Church of St. Ignatius Loyola on the Upper East Side of Manhattan.

headline.main: Funeral for Mario Cuomo Is Set for Tuesday
